admin.login.form.title: DodoCMS - Admin Login
admin.login.form.subtitle: Please enter your username and password to admin login.
error.title: Error
error.message: We're sorry, but an error has occurred.
admin.panel.table_management.description: Designed for developers, this section is your go-to for creating a new table (entity), where you'll explore an array of collection management features, perfect for crafting and refining your tables with precision.
admin.debug.title: Debug mode
admin.debug.description: Debug mode is enabled. You can read logs here and use more tools.
admin.panel.tables.table.new.title: Create a new table
admin.panel.tables.table.new.description: Refine and customize your data effortlessly with our table editing tool, enabling you to shape and fine-tune your information with precision and efficiency.
admin.panel.tables.table.edit.title: Editing your table {table}
admin.panel.tables.table.edit.descriptio: Refine and customize your data effortlessly with our table editing tool, enabling you to shape and fine-tune your information with precision and efficiency.
admin.panel.tables.table.set.table.name: Table name
admin.panel.tables.table.set.table.i18n: Do you want to enable i18n ?
admin.panel.tables.table.set.table.defau: Do you want to use the default attributes (createdAt, updatedAt)?
Enable the use of default attributes.
The deletion of this table will be permanent, and you won't be able to recover the data afterwards.
admin.panel.tables.table.create_confirm: Confirm the creation of the table
admin.panel.tables.table.edit_confirm: Confirm the modification of the table
admin.panel.tables.table.attribute.name: Name of the attribute
admin.panel.tables.table.attribute.is_th: Is this attribute a primary key?
admin.panel.tables.table.attribute.do_yo: Do you want to use auto-increment?
admin.panel.tables.table.attribute.choos: Choose an association to another table
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.title: Entries of the table {table}
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.descrip: Explore the creation, reading, updating, and deletion of entries within the {table} table. Effortlessly manage your table to suit your needs.
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.entry_n: Entry id {entry_id} is not found in table {table}
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.edit_en: An error has occurred while editing the entry.
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.create_: An error has occurred while creating the entry.
admin.panel.tables.table.entries.delete_: An error has occurred while deleting the entry.
